university.name: Università degli Studi di Palermo
university.notes: Major Sicilian university. 161 degree programs: 75 bachelor, 76 master, 10 ciclo unico. 45,000+ students. No tax area €25,000. ERSU Palermo regional scholarships.

requirements.academic_requirements: Secondary school diploma for bachelor, bachelor degree for master

admissions.notes: Some programs have numbered access (numero programmato). Medicine, Architecture require national tests.

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: Three installments: 1st (40%) at enrollment, 2nd (30%) by Dec 31, 3rd (30%) by Feb 28.
tuition.notes: No tax area €25,000. Merit requirements from 2nd year: 10 CFU by Aug 10 (yr 2), 25 CFU in 12 months (subsequent).

scholarships.description: Regional scholarship covering tuition and living expenses
scholarships.notes: Includes tuition exemption, monthly stipend, housing and meal service options

scholarships.description: Merit-based fee reduction for top high school graduates
scholarships.notes: Fee reductions for students with excellent high school results
